input.sentences: they saved the best presention for last !
[male] knew how to make a boring topic fun !
he never lost is patience with the `` dumb questions ''
there were so many options for making communication better !
at the end | [male] polled the audience to see which options were preferred .
output.sentences: Why did I have to sit in the front row and watch Dan explain for the hundredth time the pillars and foundations of profitable growth.
Dan means well and he's passionate about his role in the company.
However, I believe that he takes his passions too far and needs to relax.
I guess I'm not the only one that feels this way because Dan is in utter disbelief of the blank stares reflecting back at him as he goes on about his presentation
